title: SPACIOUS & BRIGHT STUDIO in FENWAY
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 297006479', 'Rent: $1,900 / Month', 'Beds: 0', 'Bath: 1', 'Available Date: 09/01/2022', 'Pet: Cats Only', 'Rent Includes:: Heat, Hot Water', 'Parking:: off-street parking', 'AVAILABLE SEPTEMBER for a 12-month lease -- - This is a very BRIGHT spacious studio apartment.', 'Hardwood floors throughout.', 'Big bay windows in the living area.', 'Open eat in kitchen with bar top.', 'Heat and hot water included.', 'Tiled bathroom.', 'Working professionals welcome!', 'Cats ok!', 'Private Brownstone building.', 'Private off-street parking for rent.', 'Private patios available.', 'Storage space for rent.', 'Access to package concierge lockers.', 'The location is absolutely amazing.', 'Centrally located nearby multiple universities (Northeastern, Berklee, New England Conservatory), several train stations (Hynes Conventions is closest), multiple bus lines, and tons of entertainment.', 'The Back Bay and Newbury Street & Boylston Street in one direction, and historic Fenway Park in the other.', 'The Emerald Necklace surrounds the area, offering many adventurous paths.', 'There are countless, stores, restaurants, pubs, and more within short distance of the front door.', 'To view this apartment or for any questions, please send inquires about this apartment to David.']
